attributes.action: DEPORT ANY FOREIGNERS WHO BREAK THE LAW AND BAN THEM FOR LIFE FROM THE UK
attributes.additional_details:
It is time that we put a stop to people coming to the uk to commit crime. (For example one third of all romanians in the uk have been arrested since being here!!!!)

Any foreign national convicted of any offence at all (including pickpocketing, assault etc) should be deported and banned from the uk.

Protect everyone from these unsavoury people and millions of pounds wasted in repeatedly policing them.

Dont just read this-sign!!!!
